mapper.insert: INSERT INTO verification (userid, token, expirydate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{token}, #{expiryDate})
mapper.select: SELECT v."verificationid" as verificationId, v."token" AS token, v."expirydate" AS expiryDate, v."userid" AS userId FROM public."verification" v WHERE v."token" = #{token}

SELECT v."verificationid" AS verificationId, v."token" AS token, v."expirydate" AS expiryDate, u."userid" AS user_userId, u."email" AS user_email, u."firstname" AS user_firstname FROM public."verification" v INNER JOIN public."user" u ON v.userid = u.userid
